page.name: Weekly Announcements
page.content:
Dear Instructors,

As simple as they may be, weekly announcements in an online course can play a vital role in fostering the learning community and establishing instructor presence. A weekly announcement might include the following items:

Housekeeping

  • Upcoming deadline reminders, updates, etc.
  • Reiterating important policies/procedures as needed

Weekly Recap with Highlights

  • Summarize the past week’s learning outcomes
  • Draw connections with previous weeks’ concepts
  • What went well and what were some of the challenges
  • Highlight outstanding student work

Forecast the Upcoming Week

  • Get students excited about what’s coming up next
  • Draw connections with previous week
  • Place the upcoming week in the overall trajectory of the course
  • Praise students for their continued efforts and good work

The weekly announcement template below is designed to help you capture some of these important items in your weekly announcement to students. For more information on creating announcements in Moodle, see Making Announcements.

Note: This page is "hidden" (grayed-out on the homepage), meaning it (and others like it) are not visible to students.

Greetings [[[[[course name]]]]] Students,

Last week we … [[[[[UPDATE]]]]]

In our [[[[[# (e.g., third]]]]] week, our lessons focus on [[[[[insert week’s topic]]]]].

In this week’s topic, we explore [[[[[insert brief overview of weekly topic here]]]]].

The activities/assignments due this week are:

[[[[[Insert list of assignments and due dates here]]]]]

  • Assignment 1 due [[[[[date]]]]]
  • Assignment 2 due [[[[[date]]]]]
  • Assignment 3 due [[[[[date]]]]]

Please look to the Week [[[[[#]]]]] Overview for further details. A few additional notes: [[[[[insert additional notes about the week or future weeks here]]]]]
